author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Kanamic Network to offer off-floor distribution of shares
text:
Feb 8 (Reuters) - Kanamic Network Co Ltd
* Says it will offer an off-floor distribution of 400,000 shares on Tokyo Stock Exchange between Feb. 26 and Feb. 28
* Offering price will be determined based on the closing share price of the day before the distribution
* Says the limitation for distribution is up to 300 shares for each customer
Source text in Japanese: goo.gl/DYorPj
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
